analysis_objective: Analyze factors influencing sales performance and identify opportunities for improvement

key_findings.finding: Strong positive correlation (0.96) between price and competitor_price
Strong positive correlation (0.96) between competitor_price and price
customer_segment segment 'High Value' has 139.7% higher sales than segment 'Low Value'
customer_segment segment 'High Value' has 33.2% higher marketing_spend than segment 'Low Value'

recommendations.recommendation: Conduct deeper time-series analysis on marketing_spend to understand factors driving the increasing trend
Conduct deeper time-series analysis on sales to understand factors driving the decreasing trend
Investigate potential causal relationship between price and competitor_price
Analyze factors contributing to high sales in customer_segment segment 'High Value'
Segment analysis by customer demographics to identify highest-value customer profiles
Analyze conversion rates across different marketing channels to optimize campaign allocation
